title: PEC Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Associate Post
description: Punjab Engineering College (PEC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech., M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the PEC Notification 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For mor...
